title: Bug 6536: 'Add Javadoc' option does not work in TH
description: When trying to add Javadoc on a field in TH (Table Header), selecting the 'Add Javadoc' option from the context menu does not have any effect. It would be expected that selecting this option would add Javadoc to the field.
OB:
1. Right-click on a field in TH.
2. Select the 'Add Javadoc' option from the context menu.
3. Observe that nothing happens.
EB:
1. Right-click on a field in TH.
2. Select the 'Add Javadoc' option from the context menu.
3. The Javadoc should be added to the field.
SR:
1. Open the TH (Table Header) containing fields.
2. Right-click on a field.
3. Select the 'Add Javadoc' option from the context menu.
4. Verify that the Javadoc is successfully added to the field.
